actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the secretary of the interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston harbor national recreation area in Mass.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the State of Massachusetts. Authorizes the appropriation of up to $300,000 to carry out such study.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the secretary of the interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston harbor national recreation area in Mass.
